content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite satisfactory. Let's discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also fits within my budget. I'm thinking of a price around 800 Euro per month. Does that sound reasonable to you?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 800 Euro per month is a very reasonable price for an unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I'm sure we can work something out. Would you be willing to pay a deposit of one month's rent to secure the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A deposit sounds fair to me, but I'd like to discuss the amount. Could we agree on a deposit of 500 Euro instead? I believe it's a fair reflection of the apartment's value and my commitment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 Euro as a deposit is acceptable to me. It shows your commitment to the apartment. Now, regarding the rent, I'm willing to accept 800 Euro per month if you agree to a one-year lease and pay the utilities separately. Is this arrangement acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A one-year lease sounds good to me, and paying utilities separately is also acceptable. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on the deposit. With these terms, I believe we have a solid agreement. Would you agree to the price of 800 Euro per month, including the one-month deposit of 500 Euro?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euro per month, including the one-month deposit of 500 Euro. This is a fair deal, and I look forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
